dataset.select: select bc.id, bc.status_id, s.note as status_name, case when bc.owner_id is null then 'Начальный остаток' else bc.document_name end as document_name, bc.document_date, bc.document_number, case when bc.operation_summa > 0::money then bc.operation_summa else null end as income, case when bc.operation_summa < 0::money then (@bc.operation_summa::numeric)::money else null end as expense, c.name as contractor_name from balance_contractor bc join status s on (s.id = bc.status_id) left join contractor c on (c.id = bc.reference_id) where bc.reference_id = :owner_id order by bc.document_date desc
dataset.select-id: select bc.id, bc.status_id, s.note as status_name, case when bc.owner_id is null then 'Начальный остаток' else bc.document_name end as document_name, bc.document_date, bc.document_number, case when bc.operation_summa > 0::money then bc.operation_summa else null end as income, case when bc.operation_summa < 0::money then (@bc.operation_summa::numeric)::money else null end as expense, c.name as contractor_name from balance_contractor bc join status s on (s.id = bc.status_id) left join contractor c on (c.id = bc.reference_id) where bc.id = :id

dataset.insert: insert into balance_contractor (reference_id) values (:owner_id) returning id
dataset.select: select bc.id, bc.operation_summa, bc.document_date, c.name as contractor_name, bc.document_name, bc.document_number from balance_contractor bc join contractor c on (c.id = bc.reference_id) where bc.id = :id
dataset.update: update balance_contractor set operation_summa = :operation_summa, document_date = :document_date where id = :id
